text:
Looking at this historical German letter, I can identify the following information:

```json
{
    "letter_title": ["null"],
    "send_date": ["1936-09-09"],
    "sender_persons": ["null"],
    "receiver_persons": ["Basler Rheinschiffahrtsaktiengesellschaft Direktion"]
}
```

The letter is dated "Basel, den 9. September 1936" and is addressed to "Basler Rheinschiffahrtsaktiengesellschaft Direktion" (Basel Rhine Shipping Corporation Management) in Basel, Marktgasse 5. The letter appears to be regarding a request for consideration of a birthday present advance of 384000 francs to the Basel shipping company. However, there is no visible title for the letter, and the sender's name/signature is not visible in this image.
